name: Knockball pool
description:
Play against yourself or the computer in this physics-based billiards hit! Battle against the computer’s AI and knock the most balls off of the board to win, or challenge yourself to earn a 3-star rating for using the minimum number of hits on all 160 obstacle-packed levels!

Uses real pool physics!
Balance luck and skill!
160 levels packed with different obstacles!
You can play against the computer!
